title: 80 channels under the sea
creator_credit: Supreme Sound Studios, Ted Holliday and Max Lemon
brief_description: Tells in simple terms, the story of the manufacture and laying of the first stage of the Commonwealth Pacific Cable across the Tasman Sea between Bondi and Auckland and the advantages that this new 80 channel coaxial submarine cable will bring: high quality, trouble free telephone, telegraph, telex-leased teleprinter, photo-telegraph and broadcast services between Australia, North America, Britain and Europe.
